message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I value your offer, I'm looking for something closer to $10,500 given the value this product offers. What do you think?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $10,000?
